title: The centre/store may be at one place or may be distributed within the layout to make it accessible f
clause_text: The centre/store may be at one place or may be distributed within the layout to make it accessible from the different parts of layout; These centers/stores shall not abut any roads more than 31 m wide
section: Additional facilities in the Development in Large Holding/layout

source_pdf.text_snippet: The centre/store may be at one place or may be distributed within the layout to make it accessible from the different parts of layout;
